service.name: Student Affairs Office
service.short: Currently the Hong Kong government imposes restrictions on inbound travellers from various countries and they are subjected to compulsory quarantine measure.

service.name: School Partnership
service.short: Due to capacity constraints, the University cannot handle any requests for on-campus accommodation for the purpose of the 14-day compulsory quarantine.

service.name: Research and Development
service.short: Students shall need to find accommodations for the quarantine by themselves
